name: Ilya Potapenko
personality: Brave and decisive, but also stubborn and headstrong.
story: Ilya Potapenko was born and raised in Russia. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks. He is a highly skilled soldier and a natural leader, but his blunt attitude often rubs people the wrong way. Despite this, his troops respect him for his bravery and tenacity in the face of danger.
